{{ main_content }}

GO TO WEBSITE

Best regards,
ARUMPRO CAPITAL LIMITED

Phone +357 25222094 / Fax +357 25222089 / Email: info@arumcapital.eu

 
This e-mail was sent from a notification-only address that cannot accept incoming e-mails. Remember to add noreply@arumcaputal.eu to your safe sender list.
 

Legal: ArumCapital is a brand name owned and operated by ArumPro Capital Ltd., a Cyprus Investment Firm (Reg. No. HE352951), regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (CySEC) under CIF license number xxx/17. ArumPro Capital Ltd. is located at 2 Gregory Afxentiou Street, Office 201, Limassol 4003, Cyprus.
 

Confidentiality Notice: The information contained in this message is for the intended addressee only and may contain confidential and/or privileged information. If you are not the intended addressee, please deleted this message and notify the sender. Do not copy or distribute this message or disclose its contents to anyone.
 

Risk Disclosure: Currency pairs (Forex) and CFDs, being marginal products, are of high risk and may result in the loss of all invested capital. Hence, Currency pairs and CFDs may not be suitable for all investors. You should not risk more than you can afford to lose. Before you start trading please ensure you understand the risks involved and that you have sufficient level of expertise and experience.

fields.html:
{{ main_content }}

перейти на сайт

Всегда на связи,
​команда ARUM Capital.
8-800-350-77-10
+7 (495) 240-81-33
ARUMPRO Capital Ltd

 
Уведомление о рисках: Валютные пары (FOREX) и CFD, являющиеся маржинальными продуктами, имеют высокий уровень риска и могут повлечь потерю всего инвестиционного капитала. Поэтому Валютные пары и CFD-контракты могут не подходить для всех инвесторов. Вы не должны рисковать тем, что не готовы потерять. Перед началом торговли, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что понимаете все риски и учитываете свой уровень опыта.

Здравствуйте, {{ user.first_name }}!

​Вами был создан счет. 

Номер счёта: {{ login }} Пароль: {{ password }}

Привет, {{recommendation.name}}! Я начал зарабатывать на финансовых рынках с помощью брокера ARUM Capital. Теперь я знаю главное: неважно, растет курс валюты или падает – я всегда заработаю на разнице цен. Это доступно каждому! Присоединяйся! Станем успешными вместе! От: {{recommendation.user.profile}}

Поздравляем Вас с успешной регистрацией Личного кабинета в Arum Capital!

{% url 'registration_activate' activation_key as activation_url %} Чтобы активировать вашу учётную запись, пожалуйста воспользуйтесь следующей ссылкой: {{ current_site.domain }}{{ activation_url }}

 

ВНИМАНИЕ: пожалуйста, активируйте учётную запись в течение {{ expiration_days }} дней, иначе она будет заблокирована.

 

Для входа в Личный Кабинет вам понадобятся:
Имя пользователя: {{ user.email }}
Пароль: {{ password }}

Hello, {{ user.first_name }}!


We congratulate you with successful registration at Personal Cabinet at ARUM Capital!


 

{% url 'registration_activate' activation_key as activation_url %} To activate your account, please use the following link: "{{ current_site.domain }}{{ activation_url }}"

WARNING: please activate your account within {{ expiration_days }} days, otherwise it will be blocked.

 

You can access your Pesonal Cabinet using your individual credentials:

User name: {{ user.email }}

Password: {{ password }}

To fully verify your account, you will need to complete your profile registration and upload the following:

  • Proof of Identification (POI) – clear colour scanned copy of your Internationa Passport. If you do not hold an International Passport, you may provide one other form of valid government-issued identification document (ID card, Driving License). The POI should contain holder’s full name, photo and signature, date of birth, issue/expiry date and document number.

  • Proof of Residence (POR) – clear coloured scanned copy of a recent utility bill, bank statement, local authority bill or any other official document stating your name and full adress, as written in your online registration with ArmCapital. The POR issue date must be less that 6 months back.

 

 

If you require further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@arumcapital.eu or through Live Chat / Contact us / Request a Call Back

Hello {{ user.first_name }}, ​your personal documents have been verified by our Back Office Team!

Now you can explore and participate the World of Financial Markets.

All you need to do is to download the platform of your choice and fund your trading account.

Then you can start trading.

We would like to inform you have been categorised as a Retail Client and your account shall be treated with the highest level of security.

Visit our Educational Center to read up the Articles and Tutorials we have prepared for our clients, or watch our Webinars to broaden your knowledge on the financial investment.


If you require further assistance, please don't hesitate to contact us at support@arumcapital.eu or through Live Chat / Contact us / Request a Call Back 

 

Should you interested in Portfolio Management service offered by ARUM Capital, please contact pm@arumcapital.eu

 

By proceeding to the Company’s website you acknowledge the completion of the appropriateness form (the questions you answered at registration) and declare that you understand the risks associated with Forex and CFD trading.

We wish you a successful experience.
